name: Easter Hunt
description:
Hunt or be hunted.   The Easter bunny is always watching.


Tonight is the Easter Hunt, an annual ceremony demanded by the elder god Achpas. As is the custom, the village selects a young person to become the chosen. The chosen has to go inside the sacred forest, collect seven easter eggs and offer them to Achpas. If the chosen fails to do so, they shall become fodder for the creatures that live in the forest.

This year I volunteer to become the chosen. I have been training for this day all my life. None of my friends has managed to return from the forest so I want to find out what happened to them.

Find all easter eggs before the bunny finds you!  Warning this game is very difficult!

The music for this game was created by  @AlexanderBruyns
